column4: Howdy all, how do I get gnome to show all items on the desktop?  For example, using a terminal I create test.txt file in my ~/Desktop folder, but it doesn't show up on the desktop.
go to Apps > System Tools > Conf Editor > then App > Nautilus > Desktop
what I am looking for in there?  I've turned on the computer/home icons, etc, and they show up fine.  do I need to add a new key?
